pageContext.claim: “A.P. has just reported that the Russian Hoax Investigation has now cost our government over $17 million, and going up fast. No Collusion, except by the Democrats!”
pageContext.analysis: Special counsel Robert Mueller has reported $16.7 million in expenses as of March 31, a figure that combines his team's direct expenses of $7.7 million and a separate $9 million spent by the Justice Department to support the investigation. There are different ways of counting Mueller's expenses and Trump is using the absolute maximum. The investigation into possible collusion between Russia and Trump's campaign continues, and no conclusions have been announced. There's no evidence Democrats colluded with Russia.
